vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.17;
son of: Eliezer (H0461H);
father of: Isshiah (H3449J)
§ Rehabiah = "Jehovah has enlarged"
the only son of Eliezer and grandson of Moses
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Eliézer; jefe; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利哈比雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已擴增"
以利以謝的兒子, 摩西的孫子 (代上 23:17, 24:21, 26:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利哈比雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已扩增"
以利以谢的儿子, 摩西的孙子 (代上 23:17, 24:21, 26:25)
